Blackstorm:


Blackstorm looked to Maxima, she seemed that she was ready to attack 
her but she didn't felt fear. She smiled and said "You should better 
keep  your strengt"said firmly but with a polite tone "I'm not a 
treat, I'm a Predacon as you, I'm Blackstorm... I'm Perceptor's 
assistant"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/18/03 12:51:14 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > Blackstorm typed more buttons, hoping that that could help her 
to 
> > heal more quickly.
> > 
> 
> Whatever she did, it barely helped. Something was most definitely 
not right. 
> 
> Maxima's optics opened & flashed dimly. Her optics glanced at 
Blackstorm. She 
> never knew her at Nightlight. But, then again, Maxima never knew 
her at all. 
> Rather wary of another, she moved & shifted. She was weak & unable 
to 
> confront what she may have believed Blackstorm to be a possible 
threat. She 
> watched her for a moment, her optics glued to her like a hawk 
watching a 
> mouse. Her long black claws flexed.
